account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your account settings and membership benefits

renew.title: Renew
renew.description: Manage your membership service and renewal

members.title: Member Management
members.description: After adding members, they can share your membership benefits. Suitable for families, businesses, and multi-user scenarios.
members.noMembersDesc: You haven't added any members yet
members.emailHelp: Members will log in using this email and access your membership benefits
members.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use
members.addMemberFailedRetry: Failed to add member, please try again
members.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member? Once removed, the member will no longer be able to use your membership benefits.
members.removeMemberFailedRetry: Failed to remove member, please try again
members.getMembersFailedRetry: Failed to retrieve member list, please try again

delegate.title: Payment Delegate Management
delegate.description: Manage users who pay for your account
delegate.noDelegate: You currently have no payment delegate, you're using your own membership benefits
delegate.info: A user is currently paying for your account. You can use that user's membership benefits.
delegate.rejectWarning: After rejecting payment delegation, you will lose the membership benefits provided by this user and will need to pay yourself or find another payment delegate.

rejectSuccess.title: Rejected Successfully
rejectSuccess.description: You have successfully rejected the payment delegation relationship

wallet.title: My Wallet
wallet.description: Manage your wallet balance and withdrawals

members.title: User Member Management
members.noMembers: This user has no members yet
members.noMembersDesc: This user hasn't added any members yet
members.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member? Once removed, the member will no longer be able to use this user's membership benefits.
members.getMembersFailedRetry: Failed to retrieve member list, please try again

retailerRules.title: Reseller Rules
retailerRules.subtitle: Learn about the Kaitu Reseller Programme rules and reward mechanisms

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions about the reseller programme, please contact our partner team

migrated.title: Task System Migrated
migrated.description: Asynchronous tasks are now managed through the Asynqmon monitoring dashboard. You can view task queues, execution status, and history in Asynqmon. Email send logs can be viewed on the EDM Send Logs page.
